div.p: A CodeSystem that identifies the language used by a person.
This code system https://hl7.org.uk/fhir/CodeSystem/CareConnect-HumanLanguage-1 defines the following codes:

tr.td: Church Slavic; Old Slavonic; Church Slavonic; Old Bulgarian; Old Church Slavonic

description.value: A CodeSystem that identifies the language used by a person.

display.value: Church Slavic; Old Slavonic; Church Slavonic; Old Bulgarian; Old Church Slavonic
